contents:
主里有一份英文报道： 

https://www.ibtimes.com/were-april-parliamentary-elections-south-korea-rigged-fraudulent-2980943

是NEC 间接用了华为设备：
The NEC selected LG U+ 5G, which uses Huawei equipment, to provide internet and Wifi for the handling of the pre-vote ballots.

但是预计此事会不了了之，
除非 CIA 送来专家抓到服务器上的 LOG，
极大可能早删除了。
